statements: SELECT * FROM historical_documents;
SELECT document_title, document_author FROM historical_documents WHERE document_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT document_title, document_author, document_date FROM historical_documents ORDER BY document_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT document_title FROM historical_documents WHERE document_author = 'Shakespeare';
SELECT * FROM historical_documents WHERE document_content LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM historical_documents WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT document_title, document_author FROM historical_documents WHERE document_date BETWEEN '1800-01-01' AND '1850-12-31';
SELECT document_author, document_date FROM historical_documents WHERE document_author LIKE '%Washington%' ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT document_title, document_content FROM historical_documents WHERE document_date > '1900-01-01' ORDER BY document_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT document_id, document_author, COUNT(*) AS total_documents FROM historical_documents GROUP BY document_author HAVING total_documents > 3 ORDER BY total_documents DESC;
SELECT * FROM Documents;
SELECT doc_title, doc_date FROM Documents WHERE doc_id = 1;
SELECT doc_title, doc_content FROM Documents ORDER BY doc_date DESC;
SELECT doc_id, doc_title, doc_date FROM Documents WHERE doc_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT D.doc_title, M.author FROM Documents D JOIN Metadata M ON D.doc_id = M.doc_id;
SELECT doc_title, doc_date FROM Documents WHERE doc_id = 1;
SELECT doc_title, author FROM Documents JOIN Metadata ON Documents.doc_id = Metadata.doc_id WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Documents WHERE doc_date > '2022-01-01' AND doc_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT doc_id, doc_title, metadata_date FROM Metadata JOIN Documents ON Metadata.doc_id = Documents.doc_id WHERE metadata_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM Metadata WHERE doc_id IN (SELECT doc_id FROM Documents WHERE doc_date < '2022-06-01');
SELECT * FROM historical_documents;
SELECT document_name, document_date FROM historical_documents WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_date FROM historical_documents ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT document_content FROM historical_documents WHERE document_date >= '2022-01-01' AND document_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT document_id, document_name, metadata_key, metadata_value FROM historical_documents JOIN document_metadata ON historical_documents.document_id = document_metadata.document_id;
SELECT document_name, document_date FROM historical_documents WHERE document_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM document_metadata WHERE metadata_key LIKE '%author%';
SELECT version_number, version_date FROM document_versions WHERE document_id = 1001 ORDER BY version_date DESC;
SELECT document_name, metadata_key, metadata_value FROM historical_documents JOIN document_metadata ON historical_documents.document_id = document_metadata.document_id;
SELECT AVG(version_number) AS average_version_number FROM document_versions WHERE version_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM historical_documents;
SELECT document_id, document_title FROM historical_documents ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT document_title FROM historical_documents WHERE document_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT document_id, author_name, category_name FROM historical_documents JOIN document_metadata ON historical_documents.document_id = document_metadata.document_id JOIN document_authors ON document_metadata.author_id = document_authors.author_id JOIN document_categories ON document_metadata.category_id = document_categories.category_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_documents FROM historical_documents;
SELECT * FROM historical_documents ORDER BY document_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT document_title, document_content FROM historical_documents WHERE document_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_title, document_content, document_date FROM historical_documents WHERE document_id = '87ba01f3-8b82-4c1b-8db2-9eea656eac66';
SELECT author_name, category_name FROM document_authors JOIN document_categories ON document_authors.author_id = document_categories.category_id;

SELECT document_title, author_name, category_name FROM historical_documents JOIN document_metadata ON historical_documents.document_id = document_metadata.document_id JOIN document_authors ON document_authors.author_id = document_metadata.author_id JOIN document_categories ON document_categories.category_id = document_metadata.category_id ORDER BY document_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Documents;
SELECT document_id, title, author FROM Documents;
SELECT author, title, publication_date FROM Documents;
SELECT metadata_type, metadata_value FROM Metadata;
SELECT category_name FROM Categories;
SELECT title, author FROM Documents WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT document_id, title, author FROM Documents WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Documents JOIN Metadata ON Documents.document_id = Metadata.document_id WHERE Metadata.metadata_type = 'topic';

SELECT title, category_name FROM Documents JOIN DocumentCategories ON Documents.document_id = DocumentCategories.document_id JOIN Categories ON DocumentCategories.category_id = Categories.category_id;
SELECT document_id, permission_type FROM Documents JOIN Permissions ON Documents.document_id = Permissions.document_id WHERE Permissions.user_id = 123;
